alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns, north central Clay and central Duval Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Normandy, or 7 miles northwest of Orange Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Arlington, Baymeadows, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
